definitions.definition: A mineral consisting, like quartz , of silica , but inferior to quartz in hardness and specific gravity , of the chemical formula Si O 2 · n H 2 O .

subdefinitions.definition: A precious gem , an iridescent gemstone found in the opal-silica mineral substrate ( potch )

definitions.definition: The colour of opal: any shade of blue with bright flecks of other colours, such as white, yellow, and red.
A colloquial name used in molecular biology referring to a particular stop codon sequence, "UGA."
Any of various lycaenid butterflies of the genus Nesolycaena .

main_definition: ( mineralogy ) A mineral consisting, like quartz , of silica , but inferior to quartz in hardness and specific gravity , of the chemical formula Si O 2 · n H 2 O .
secondary_definitions: The colour of opal: any shade of blue with bright flecks of other colours, such as white, yellow, and red.
( biology , genetics , biochemistry ) A colloquial name used in molecular biology referring to a particular stop codon sequence, "UGA."
Any of various lycaenid butterflies of the genus Nesolycaena .
